title: Jin Seong-uk
text:
Jin Seong-uk (; <a href="Hanja">Hanja</a>: 陳成昱; born 16 December 1993) is a South Korean <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">Forward</a> who plays for <a href="Sangju%20Sangmu">Sangju Sangmu</a> in <a href="K%20League%201">K League 1</a>.
Club career.
Jin joined <a href="Incheon%20United%20FC">Incheon United</a> in 2012. On 18 March 2012, he made his league debut against <a href="Daegu%20FC">Daegu FC</a> by replacing <a href="Kim%20Han-seob">Kim Han-seob</a>.
International career.
He has been a member of the <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">South Korea national U-23 team</a>. He played for the South Korea in <a href="2016%20AFC%20U-23%20Championship">2016 AFC U-23 Championship</a>, played 2 games and scored 1 goal there. His first goal was scored against <a href="Japan%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Japan U-23 team</a> in Final on 30 January 2016.
